criteria: Label must be one of: POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, NEUTRAL, MIXED
MIXED is appropriate when both positive and negative signals coexist
Confidence should be lower for ambiguous or sarcastic text
Reasoning must reference specific phrases that drove the classification
common_errors: Classifying factual statements as NEUTRAL when they carry implicit sentiment
Missing sarcasm or irony that flips polarity
Overconfident on short or ambiguous texts
